mentions.candidate: I know Tom personally, so I know he will always put this constituency first. - Mary Leggat Local resident

issues.economy: As a life-long trade unionist, I’m proud that Labour introduced the minimum wage. - Hugh Gourlay
issues.governance: We need a Labour government to protect the devolution settlement. - Archie Graham
issues.socialWelfare: Only Labour understands the value of the winter heating allowance. - Edith Quinn. Removing it would be a disaster.

endorsements.endorsement: I know Tom personally, so I know he will always put this constituency first.
As a life-long trade unionist, I’m proud that Labour introduced the minimum wage.
Only Labour understands the value of the winter heating allowance. Removing it would be a disaster.
We need a Labour government to protect the devolution settlement.
